Test Name: EGFR Targeted Mutation Analysis with ALK Reflex Testing
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue (blocks or unstained slides)
Purpose: To detect targeted EGFR mutations and, if negative, assess ALK status in tumor specimens for therapeutic decision-making.
Container: FFPE block or unstained glass slide
Equipment: PCR/qPCR instrument (or NGS platform), microtome, DNA extraction kit, ALK IHC/FISH equipment (e.g., fluorescence microscope)
